thread.title: Emily Ratajkowski Turns the Bold Bob Into a Golden Globes Beauty Win
thread.title_full: Emily Ratajkowski Turns the Bold Bob Into a Golden Globes Beauty Win

author: Mackenzie Wagoner
title: Emily Ratajkowski Turns the Bold Bob Into a Golden Globes Beauty Win

persons.name: emily ratajkowski turns the bold bob

text:
Emily Ratajkowski Turns the Bold Bob Into a Golden Globes Beauty Win January 8, 2017 7:22 pm Expand Photo: Getty Images 
Emily Ratajkowski is a red carpet’s golden girl, as proven at tonight’s Golden Globe Awards , where she debuted a beachy, shoulder-grazing bob that sent flashbulbs popping. Dressed in a plunging buttery yellow silk dress that she paired with glossy skin and metallic smoky shadow, the actress took an otherwise fail-safe route to the best-dressed list. But the fresh proportions of her new textured chop—which were a bold departure from the waist-length bombshell locks that have become her signature—took a page from the superstar playbook: When it comes to the red carpet, it pays to break the rules.
